# Understanding README-Driven Documentation

---

## Introduction
- Why documentation matters  
- What a README is  

---

## README-Driven Development
- Plan through writing first  
- README guides the project  

---

## What Goes in a README?
- What the project does  
- How to set it up  
- How to use it  
- Who made it  

---

## Why It’s Helpful
- Keeps team on the same page  
- Easier for new people to join  
- Fewer questions later  

---

## Common Mistakes
- Too long or too technical  
- Missing steps  
- Not kept up to date  

---

## Best Tips
- Write it early  
- Keep it short and clear  
- Update as project changes  

---

## Wrap-Up
- README is your project’s front door  
- Clear docs = happy users
